entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ExceptBy doesn't include duplicates by comparer in first set that should not be excluded #64149
  • Remove `!` from `Microsoft.Extensions.Caching.Abstractions` #64147
  • Pipelines API: Reading incoming bytes #64145
  • The framework 'Microsoft.AspNetCore.App', version '6.0.0' (x64) was not found #64136
  • Detect when wrong tools are on PATH #64135
    7.0.0
  • System.Tests.TimeZoneInfoTests.NJulianRuleTest crashing on Linux arm #64134
    7.0.0

Closed

  • ildasm has problems with non-ASCII characters #64045
  • CryptoStream.Read(Byte[], Int32, Int32) read the wrong data #64144
  • Principal ExtensionSet improper update for multi-valued properties with >2 values #34267
    7.0.0
  • Add Pure-attribute to Tuple types #64141
  • [macos][arm64][CoreCLR] DllImportGenerator.Unit.Tests failed: Segmentation fault #63439
    7.0.0
  • AF: g_TblIndex[ixTbl].m_Token == type in System.Reflection.Metadata.ApplyUpdate tests #64070
    7.0.0
  • ExecutionContext flow for library code #62589
  • .net6, GetManifestResourceNames return empty #64090
  • Type.GetMethod ignores BindingFlag.DeclaredOnly for records #64124

PullRequests

Created

  • ARM64: Avoid jump stubs where possible #64148
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix several bugs in NullabilityInfoContext. #64143
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Ensure that we aren't accidentally generating instructions for unsupported ISAs #64140
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add test for exception throw inside Reverse PInvoke #64137
    community-contribution
  • Update tests to expect RemoteExecutor to check exit code #64133
  • Structs: Do not mark "Hidden buffer pointer" as address-exposed #64130
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Optimize generic sharing for generic methods. #64129
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • align memory load calculation in GC with Docker and Kubernetes #64128
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution

Merged

  • Extra tests for assembly name parser. #64022
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Fix MultiByteToWideChar call in pal #64146
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Updating and fixing unit tests for DirectoryServices.AccountManagement #56670
    area-System.DirectoryServices, blocked, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Disable NJulianRuleTest test crashing in CI #64142
  • Relax assert in ApplyEditAndContinue #64132
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Fixing update issue with multivalued properties #34267 #56696
    area-System.DirectoryServices, blocked, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • pipelines: Add wasm jobs #64109
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Add COMWrappers to crossgen #63969
    area-crossgen2-coreclr

Updated

  • Add runtime support for `ref` fields #63985
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • JIT: simple forward substitution pass #63720
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Including FastFloat in parsing process #62301
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Faster IndexOf for substrings #63285
    area-System.Memory
  • [Group 2] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Options` #63767
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Options, community-contribution
  • Dispose LdapConnections used by PrincipalContext.ValidateCredentials #62036
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • [Group 2] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Caching.Abstractions` #64018
    area-Extensions-Caching, community-contribution
  • Improve incremental build times of the libraries subset #64000
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Implement support to Set Next Instruction Pointer. #64114
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Commutative morph optimizations #64122
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Improve `fgValueNumberBlockAssignment` #64110
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Preserve existing keys in dictionary #63834
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Add the exception set for `ObjGetType` #64106
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Member resolving fix for derived attributes (#62937) #63837
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • NativeAOT: ICustomMarshaller #62921
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Move libunwind directories to src/native/external #64043
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Moved AssemblyName helpers to managed #62866
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • add osr plus stress tests for libraries #64116
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Morph `Vector.Create(0)` to `Vector.Zero` #63821
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix one source of perf regression in GCHeap::Alloc. #64091
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Bump Intellisensense package version to latest from `dotnet7-transport` #63352
  • [Mono][Test] Collapse mono runtime tests into single builds using global-build-job template #62863
    area-Infrastructure
  • Android remove backward timezones #64028
